# Practical 7

This folder contains the information about the Practical 7

## Compile1:

*gcc pointers.c -o pointersC -lm
 

## Execute

*./pointersC

Output: 

1 1 1 1 1

## Compile2:

*gcc fra.c -o fraC -lm

## Execute

*./fraC

Output:
